snippet: Egyptian police officers blocked the Rafah crossing into the Gaza Strip on Friday to protest the kidnapping of seven of their colleagues by Islamist gunmen, witnesses said.
abstract: Angry Egyptian police officers block Rafah crossing into Gaza Strip to protest kidnapping of seven of their colleagues by Islamist gunmen, leaving hundreds of Palestinians stranded on both sides.
lead_paragraph: Egyptian police officers blocked the Rafah crossing into the Gaza Strip on Friday to protest the kidnapping of seven of their colleagues by Islamist gunmen, witnesses said.

headline.seo: Angry Egyptian Police Close Gaza Crossing
headline.main: Egypt: Angry Police Close Gaza Crossing
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Angry Police Close Gaza Crossing
